titles.title: He's My Rock, My Sword, My Shield

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He's my Rock, my Sword, my Shield.
He's the Wheel in the middle of the wheel.
He's the Lily of the Valley,
The Bright and Morning Star.
It makes no difference what they say;
I'm gonna trust Him as I pray,
And I'll wait, wait right here until He comes.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We're His church, His word revealed.
We are walking in God's will.
We're His pearl of great price,
His city on a hill.
It makes no difference what we see;
With God's word we do agree.
He's the Truth, He's the Way into life.
